MAN.TITLE: draw

PARAM_ITEM.PARAM_DESCRIPTION: : a handle, the handle on an entity

MAN.DESCRIPTION:
This function can be used no to draw an entity even if its visibility property is 'off'
draw(h) is equivalent to set(get("current_axes"),"visible","off")
MAN.EXAMPLE: set("figure_style","new") // select entity based graphics t=1:10;plot2d(t,t.^2), h=get("current_figure") //gets handle on the current figure a=h.children draw (a.children) delete(a) delete(h)
MAN.AUTHOR: Djamel Abdemouche
